snippet.title: Out of Sight - Launch Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🎉The wait is finally over! 🎉
We are happy to announce the official release date for Out of Sight 🧸

Out of Sight is coming to Steam, Epic Game Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series 𝗫|𝗦 and Nintendo Switch on the 22nd of May!

Make sure to mark your calendars to bring Sophie and Teddy on adventure!

To make things even better, our friends at Flat2VR Studios confirms that the separate title Out of Sight VR will arrive on Steam VR headsets on the same date, with versions for Meta Quest and PlayStation VR2 arriving at a later date.🎉

Make sure to wishlist Out of Sight and make sure to play the demo on Steam!

#outofsight  #horrorgame  #puzzlegame #Indiegame #fyp #steam #new #gaming #indie #release #releasedate #secondpersonperspective
